reviews.review: I left the cinema feeling emotionally hollow.  Its a magnificent achievement a powerful film, a blockbuster in the epic sense and of course filled with emotional resonance that could only be there with so much history having already been established.  Thoroughly recommend.

This is just. I don't know. I cried on some good movies before, maybe 2 or 3. But I feel like Infinity War just broke me in half, like I can't function and people ask my why I'm so sad all the time now.

The movie delivers on all fronts. It is funny, emotional and action packed. No time dealing with those backstories. It's just like 'Let's go". Always kept wondering what will happen next. and my God .. THANOS!! Destiny definitely arrived!
Wall to wall action. Without spoiling, I left the theater an emotional mess.
Pays off 10 years of backstory.  Lady behind started sobbing 3 different times.
It is the best movie to come out this millennium. There is so much action, emotion, and just pure great acting.

Very enjoyable movie with a lot of pay offs, thanos was a great if not the greatest villain the MCU is yet to offer. His emotional side really comes out in this film and develops him into so much more of a character. I would put this film at number #2 out of all the MCU movies behind Civil war.

The Movie as a whole was intense, action packed, and exciting. I can without a doubt say that it will keep you at the edge of your seat the entire time. It is unlike the other “Marvel Studios” movies. Very dark and targeted towards an older audience. It is more of a “heist” film rather than a “war” but that was expected saying as it’s all been leading to him collecting the stones. Don’t get me wrong though, there definitely was a war. The start of the movie was very intense and really sets the tone of the movie as a whole. Thanos was a really great villian and in my opinion, the best villian of the MCU. I did have a bit of a complaint on the The Black Order(the cull obsidian) as they did not touch on them much and they felt more like more like slot fillers yet, I still believe they did a great job using them with the time period they had. The only other complaint I have with the film is just a bit of pacing problems here and there. You really have to pay attention to understand what is happening also (WATCH THE OTHER MARVEL STUDIO FILMS TO UNDERSTAND WHAT LED UP TO THIS AMAZING FILM). Paying attention shouldn’t be a problem though because the movie will keep you at the edge of your seat the entire time as I stated earlier. Over all, I believe the Russo Brothers did a really wonderful job directing the movie and it will leave you wanting more when you finish it. I’ve never seen more people stay after the movie finished. It was really well done and very exciting and sad. It was so much things to process and it leaves you really wanting more! Thanos is a solid villian and I’m definitely coming back for the untitled Avengers 4!!!
